comments.comment: Please convert all the temple's to public heritage libraries under the United Nations. So our temples can act as open minded recreational placeS for meditation for all universal humans. So we can get rid of stupidly. Therefore all temples are managed by public trust. All transactions are audited. All Sri Lankan can go to these libraries with thir families which is under one flag. Heritage libraries in Sri Lanka is a public property regulated by the Sri Lankan  Government under international heritage Act. That sustain Buddhist philosophy and develop our 33000 rural villages not only Buddhism but rural economies intellectually . We do not need uncivilized religious leaders, last 70 years these religious leaders ruined our villages and our golden country. Professional libraries and heritage  librarian can administrate these temples. Monk can go to their own meditation villages in different districts to live funded by public otherwise they built small small temples all over the country and live like families and destroy whole Sri Lanka. Please explore the idea for better future.
comments.author: S. Vith

comments.comment:
You are spot on  my man
, you are so bold! god will bless you.
You are the right example for all poiticians in srilanka.

The problem in our country is majority are worng
So when some one speaks the truth they try to shut their gaps in order for their exsistance in wrong doing.

People should understand that ranjan is a single guy with no money with a simple plan

 He is making all this brave moves on behalf of our country and for the well being of all of us

Ranjan you are a true hero and I want you to form a team of heroes like you ,
because it will be hard for you  to fight this battle alone
against a majority who are wrong.
There should be someone to continue your battle after you and make this country correct one day.

The nature will protect you ranjan.

IN BUDDHISM IT SELF SAYS

THAT "THE ONE WHO ABIDES BY THE LAW OF NATURE 
WILL BE PROTECTED BY THE THE LAW OF NATURE"

MAY YOU WILL BE BLESSED WITH GOOD HEALTH TO FIGHT THIS BATTLE AND MAY YOU WILL BE PROTECTED.

CHEERS .

replies.replyComment:
Mr Ranjan

Please note this point. In Buddhism monks are not allowed to marry. In Christianity the religious leaders are not allowed to marry. But in Islam the religious leaders are allowed to marry, furthermore they are compelled to marry so they are living with their wives and no need to seek prostitutes or to engage in homosexuality. One more thing in Islam only male will go to the mosque for prayers and ladies are allowed to pray in their houses and the ladies do not mingle with males in the mosque.  But ladies are mingled with males in the Pansala and Churches making rooms for good and bad things.
